name: Smart Home Automation App
description: This project involves the development of a state-of-the-art smart home automation mobile application. The app will enable users to seamlessly control and monitor various smart devices in their homes, including lighting, thermostats, security cameras, and more. Integration with popular smart home ecosystems and a user-friendly interface are key components.

name: Cloud Migration and Optimization
description: In an effort to modernize our IT infrastructure, this project focuses on migrating critical systems to cloud-based platforms. The scope includes assessing existing applications, selecting appropriate cloud services, and optimizing performance for scalability and cost-effectiveness.
